name: Stupid Game (Sugar Snail)
description:
The title says it all really...

Click and drag your mouse to draw a streak of paint. Try to stop the grey things from reaching the computer in the middle. The red bar is the health of the computer and there is a timer. See how far you can get.

Enemies: 

Circles: Nothing

Squares: Shoot

Magnets: Follow the cursor

Wizard: Teleports and temporarily makes the cursor invisible. Don't kill it until it makes your cursor visible, or you'll have to wait for the next wizard to undo the spell.

King: A bit buggy but turns circles into vikings

Vikings: Bigger, better circles

This game is a prototype of the drawing mechanic. I'm going to make a non-stupid game using this mechanic, coming soon!
